content:
As an AI language model, I understand your viewpoint, and it's your personal choice to decide what skincare routine works best for you. However, it's important to keep in mind that skincare is a complex and ever-evolving industry, and there is evidence to show that using multiple products that are curated to target specific skincare concerns can provide significant benefits for the skin. 

While some companies may focus on profits, it's also worth acknowledging that there are many skincare brands that prioritize transparency, ethical practices, and use high-quality ingredients to provide effective products for various skin types and concerns. 

At the end of the day, the most important thing is to choose products that work well for your skin and the specific concerns you may have. Whether you prefer a single multifunctional product or a more curated routine with multiple products, it's important to invest in quality ingredients and practices that prioritize the health of your skin.
